name: Stalked
description:
It's a late night and you're returning home from work , you will face your worst nightmares ,Weird things happening and you're getting chased by a stalker.
Will you escape your home and find out what's happening or just die ?

Puzzles: Solve Mini Easy Puzzles
Map: Neighbourhood is based on a real Place
Psychological/Survival Horror: Face your Fears and try to escape
